00020 #include "file/SMDFileData.h"

00022 #include <sys/stat.h>

00026 #define snprintf _snprintf

00030 static const std::string SummarySec     = "SUMMARY";
00031 
00033 static const std::string Frames         = "NumberOfFrames";
00034 
00036 static const std::string FrameCols      = "FramesPerRow";
00037 
00039 static const std::string FrameRows      = "FramesPerCol";
00040 
00042 static const std::string KeyRows                = "Rows";
00043 
00045 static const std::string KeyCols                = "Cols";
00046 
00048 static const std::string KeyStartRow    = "StartRow";
00049 
00051 static const std::string KeyStartCol    = "StartCol";
00052 
00053 using namespace affxsmd;

00055 /*
00056  * Constructor
00057  */
00058 SMDFrame::SMDFrame()
00059 {
00060         // Initialize to an invalid frame.
00061         frameIdx = -1;
00062         rows = -1;
00063         cols = -1;
00064         startRow = -1;
00065         startCol = -1;
00066 }
00067

00084 /*
00085  * Check for the file existance
00086  */
00087 bool SMDFileData::Exists()
00088 {
00089         // Find the file stats.
00090         struct stat st;
00091         return (stat(filename.c_str(), &st) == 0);
00092 }
00093 
00094 /*
00095  * Get the SMDFrame information for a frame.
00096  */
00097 SMDFrame SMDFileData::GetFrame(unsigned int frameIdx)
00098 {
00099         if (frameIdx >= 0 && frameIdx < smdFrames.size())
00100         {
00101                 return smdFrames[frameIdx];
00102         }
00103         else
00104         {
00105                 SMDFrame invalidFrame;
00106                 return invalidFrame;
00107         }
00108 }
00109 
00110 /*
00111  * Read the SMD file.
00112  */
00113 bool SMDFileData::Read()
00114 {
00115         if (filename.length() == 0)
00116                 return false;
00117 
00118         isRead = ReadData();
00119         return isRead;
00120 }
00121 
00122 /*
00123  * Read the SMD data.
00124  */
00125 bool SMDFileData::ReadData()
00126 {
00127         Clear();
00128 
00129         CIniFile iniFile;
00130         std::vector<CIniFile::Record> allRecords = iniFile.GetAllRecords(filename);
00131         
00132         if (allRecords.size() == 0)
00133                 // Either the file does not exist or is not the correct format.
00134                 return false;   
00135 
00136         int numFrames = 0;
00137         if (GetIntValue(allRecords, SummarySec, Frames, numFrames) == false)
00138                 return false;
00139 
00140         if (numFrames < 1)
00141                 return false;
00142 
00143         int numRows = 0;
00144         if (GetIntValue(allRecords, SummarySec, FrameRows, numRows) == false)
00145                 return false;
00146 
00147         int numCols = 0;
00148         if (GetIntValue(allRecords, SummarySec, FrameCols, numCols) == false)
00149                 return false;
00150 
00151         frameRows = numRows;
00152         frameCols = numCols;
00153 
00154         for (int iFrame = 0; iFrame < numFrames; ++iFrame)
00155         {
00156                 SMDFrame frame;
00157                 char sectionName[10];
00158                 snprintf(sectionName,sizeof(sectionName), "%d", iFrame);
00159 
00160                 frame.frameIdx = iFrame;
00161 
00162                 if (GetIntValue(allRecords, sectionName, KeyRows, frame.rows) == false)
00163                         return false;
00164                 if (GetIntValue(allRecords, sectionName, KeyCols, frame.cols) == false)
00165                         return false;
00166                 if (GetIntValue(allRecords, sectionName, KeyStartRow, frame.startRow) == false)
00167                         return false;
00168                 if (GetIntValue(allRecords, sectionName, KeyStartCol, frame.startCol) == false)
00169                         return false;
00170         
00171                 smdFrames.push_back(frame);
00172         }
00173         
00174         return true;
00175 }
00176 
00177 /*
00178  * Clear all members except filename.
00179  */
00180 void SMDFileData::Clear()
00181 {
00182         smdFrames.clear();
00183         frameRows = 0;
00184         frameCols = 0;
00185         isRead = false;
00186 }
00187 
00188 /*
00189  * Find a Record in a collection.
00190  * Move into CIniFile?
00191  */
00192 CIniFile::Record* SMDFileData::FindRecord(std::vector<CIniFile::Record>& records, std::string section, std::string key)
00193 {
00194         for (std::vector<CIniFile::Record>::iterator ii = records.begin(); ii != records.end(); ++ii)
00195         {
00196                 if (ii->Key == key && ii->Section == section)
00197                         return &(*ii);
00198         }
00199         return 0;
00200 }
00201 
00202 /*
00203  * Get the integer value of a key.
00204  */
00205 bool SMDFileData::GetIntValue(std::vector<CIniFile::Record>& records, std::string section, std::string key, int& value)
00206 {
00207         CIniFile::Record* record = FindRecord(records, section, key);
00208         if (record == 0)
00209                 return false;
00210         value = atoi(record->Value.c_str());
00211         return true;
00212 }
